segments.text: Well , It ’ s not as crowded as we excepted , is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . But it will be soon . Look , there are two empty seats over there . Let ’ s get them before somebody else does .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , Let ’ s make ourselves comfortable since we have got quiet a long way to go .
segments.speaker: S2
